column4: hi, im trying to make an .iso file from a cdrom but i cant get it to work. i tried following the directions here ( http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-6509.html ) but when i do "dd if=/dev/cdrom of=win95.iso" it tells me that 'no medium found'. i tried it when the cd was mounted but it doesnt work either
it shouldn't be mounted when you do that, and you need to make sure of where your cdrom is in the /dev tree
well i tried /dev/cdrw but that doesnt work either. how can i found where it is in /dev?
